sentences.english: As a Bodhisattva, he would usually be standing, and dressed in jewels.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一位菩薩，他通常是站立着，穿戴着寶石。

sentences.english: The most prestigious should be "usual broad Bodhisattva" and the depositary of Buddhist texts.
sentences.chinese: 最負盛名的應該是“露齒菩薩”和藏經閣。

sentences.english: When an object pops up, the mirror will reflect it and when it disappears, there will be nothing in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 應該像佛菩薩的大圓鏡智，物來則顯，物去則空。

sentences.english: And then, one-pointed trust and devotion towards the Manjushri.
sentences.chinese: 然後，對文殊菩薩具有全然的信任和虔誠。

sentences.english: Buddha Bodhisattva only bless people willing to help themselves.
sentences.chinese: 佛菩薩只保佑那些肯幫助自己的人。

sentences.english: There is a statue of Avalokitesvara, which is the highest Bodhisattva statue in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 有一座南海觀音像，是東海帶最高的菩薩像。

sentences.english: You see, these Bodhisattvas Mahasattvas are able to obtain great benefit.
sentences.chinese: 汝觀彼諸菩薩摩訶薩，善獲利益。

sentences.english: But Manjushri's incarnation, they love it.
sentences.chinese: 但是文殊菩薩的化身，他們喜歡。

sentences.english: Their number incalculable; Thus also is the assembly of Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 非是算數之所能知，諸菩薩衆，亦復如是。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供養菩薩，唐，石窟壁畫，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: Maitreya is a widely-believed bodhisattva in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 彌勒佛被廣大民衆認爲是中國文化中的菩薩。

sentences.english: The flesh-body bodhisattva in Chinese Buddhism is a peculiar phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: “肉身菩薩”在中國佛教中是一個相當奇特的現象。

sentences.english: May Buddha Bless You With Safety And Fortune.
In this world, there are seventy two billion Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 於此世界，有七百二十億菩薩。

sentences.english: After I went to the Museum, I discovered that Guan Yin Bodhisattva has arrived in Ukiah much earlier.
sentences.chinese: 去了才知道，觀音菩薩比我們都早到了瑜伽鎮。

sentences.english: Your mom, for example, could be a bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 比如，你的媽媽，可能就是一位菩薩。
